name: Mahjong Bengal Tiger Adventure - Summer Majong Quest Deluxe
name_original: Mahjong Bengal Tiger Adventure - Summer Majong Quest Deluxe
description:
Unbelievably cool Mahjong, in which you have to play with more than 100 levels of varying difficulty. Every week updated levels. Unique and various chips on Chinese themes will not leave you indifferent. The game has a lot of chips with animals, especially the original and beautiful pieces from the Tigers. This is a real mahjong solitaire style tiger

FEATURES:
- Over 100 Original Levels
- New Daily Boards
- Many different layouts will train your mind
- Detailed Game statistics
- Awesome Chinese songs
- Days of fun
